name: slaxweb/config
description: Config component for the SlaxWeb Framework

suggest.pimple/pimple: Make use of available providers for Pimple version 3.0.x
suggest.symfony/yaml: If you would like to use YAML config files, you have to install symfony/yaml package, version 3.0.x
suggest.desperado/xml-bundle: If you would like to use XML config files, you have to install desperado/xml-bundle package, version 0.1.x
